metadata.synopsis: Vignette: Warding off decay one-liner. He is determiend to save this tree.

0.speaker: Druid Klarrvox
0.text: I will spend every drop of my magic to save this tree from death, if Chauntea wills it.

1.speaker: Druid Klarrvox
1.text: Behold - this tree is plagued by pestilence, yet refuses to die. The goddess Chauntea wishes me to save it - I can feel it.
1.context: NodeContext: chauntea pronounced "chawn-TEE-ah" earnest and sincere - vayemniri pronounced "vay-em-near-ee"
